remarks: An FPS counter can be automatically added to a game by setting the displayFPS property of the engine class to true.

properties.name: asset
properties.description: The [Asset](/documentation/Asset) that is used to give a visual representation of the entity.

properties.name: canMoveDown
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether the entity can be moved downards.

properties.name: canMoveLeft
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether the entity can be moved to the left.

properties.name: canMoveRight
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether the entity can be moved to the right.

properties.name: canMoveUp
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether the entity can be moved upwards.

properties.name: isCollidable
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether the entity can collide with other collidable entities.

properties.name: layer
properties.description: The [Layer](/documentation/Layer) that the entity is registered to.

properties.name: pos
properties.description: The position of the entity on screen relative to the top-left corner of the scene.

properties.name: velocity
properties.description: The velocity at which the entity moves.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether the entity is visible.

methods.name: addToLayer
methods.description: Adds the entity to the collection of registered entities on a [Layer](/documentation/Layer).

methods.name: collidesWith
methods.description: Checks if the entity collides with another entity.

methods.name: draw
methods.description: Draws the current FPS reading to the game scene.

methods.name: moveDown
methods.description: Moves the entity down based on the [velocity](/documentation/Entity/properties/velocity) of the entity and the [deltaTime](/documentation/Engine/properties/deltaTime) since the last update.

methods.name: moveLeft
methods.description: Moves the entity left based on the [velocity](/documentation/Entity/properties/velocity) of the entity and the [deltaTime](/documentation/Engine/properties/deltaTime) since the last update.

methods.name: moveRight
methods.description: Moves the entity right based on the [velocity](/documentation/Entity/properties/velocity) of the entity and the [deltaTime](/documentation/Engine/properties/deltaTime) since the last update.

methods.name: moveUp
methods.description: Moves the entity up based on the [velocity](/documentation/Entity/properties/velocity) of the entity and the [deltaTime](/documentation/Engine/properties/deltaTime) since the last update.

methods.name: onCollide
methods.description: The function to be called when the entity has collided with another entity.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Recalculates the number of frames per second.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
